author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JSE Says Global Asset Management's Listing To Be Suspended If It Does Not Submit Annual Report By April 30
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Johannesburg Stock Exchange:
* MONTH PERIOD STIPULATED IN JSE’S LISTINGS REQUIREMENTS..​
* GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT’S ‍LISTING ON JSE TRADING SYSTEM HAS BEEN ANNOTATED WITH A “RE”​
* LISTING OF GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT’S SECURITIES IS UNDER THREAT OF SUSPENSION AND POSSIBLE REMOVAL​
* IF GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT STILL FAILS TO SUBMIT ITS ANNUAL REPORT ON OR BEFORE 30 APRIL 2018, THEN ITS LISTING WILL BE SUSPENDED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
